channel.title: Help with jdk 6 update 7 please
channel.description: hi, i downloaded jdk 6 update 7, and i dont know what to put in environmental variables, at the moment for path i have : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_06\bin; and for classpath i have : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%; please help! and tell me what to put in, instead of that please

item.title: Help with jdk 6 update 7 please
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

make jdk1.6.6_06\bin; say jdk1.6.6_07\bin;and Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_06 say Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_07.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with jdk 6 update 7 please
item.dc:creator: @Frazzz Frazzz
item.description:
@Frazzz wrote:

hi, i downloaded jdk 6 update 7, and i dont know what to put in environmental variables, at the moment for path i have : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_06\bin; and for classpath i have : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.6_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%; please help! and tell me what to put in, instead of that please
